    • Method Detail

      • VerifyScript

        public java.lang.Boolean VerifyScript(byte[] scriptPubKey,
                                      byte[] txTo,
                                      int nIn)
                               throws DeserializeException,
                                      TxSizeMismatchException,
                                      TxIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Evaluates a Bitcoin script. Standard script verification flags are applied.
        Parameters:
        scriptPubKey - The previous output script to be evaluated
        txTo - The transaction with the input that is spending the previous output
        nIn - The index of the input in txTo that spends the scriptPubKey
        Returns:
        True, if the script evaluated successfully, and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DeserializeException - Serialization failure
        TxSizeMismatchException - Mismatch of txToLen and the size of txTo
        TxIndexOutOfBoundsException - Invalid transaction input index for txTo

      • VerifyScript

        public java.lang.Boolean VerifyScript(byte[] scriptPubKey,
                                      byte[] txTo,
                                      int nIn,
                                      java.util.Set<VerifyFlag> flags)
                               throws DeserializeException,
                                      TxSizeMismatchException,
                                      TxIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Evaluates a Bitcoin script.
        Parameters:
        scriptPubKey - The previous output script to be evaluated
        txTo - The transaction with the input that is spending the previous output
        nIn - The index of the input in txTo that spends the scriptPubKey
        flags - The script verification flags
        Returns:
        True, if the script evaluated successfully, and false otherwise
        Throws:
        DeserializeException - Serialization failure
        TxSizeMismatchException - Mismatch of txToLen and the size of txTo
        TxIndexOutOfBoundsException - Invalid transaction input index for txTo
